name: KEYPER PROTOTYPE
description:
! WARNING !

POTENTIALLY TRIGGER SEIZURES FOR PEOPLE WITH PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY.

CONTROLLER: Mouse & Keyboard [Playable with multiple keyboards]

Experimental 3D skill-based control game, using the mechanics of key-logging behaviors to create gamified unique data collector.

Prototype created for educational purposes only, feel free to watch the trailer.

I challenge you to experience it, contact me, or even buy a coffee ;)
